column6: The Torch is (theoretically) alive and (arguably) free.  But the consequences of the Thinker's experiments are about to engulf the world in a nightmare from which there's no waking up - unless Tom (Toro) Raymond can persuade his old friend that there are still things worth fighting for! Rated T  ...$3.99
column8: | penciller:Patrick Berkenkotter | penciller:Alex Ross | writer:Mike Carey | letterer:Todd Klein
